name:
[Highlight session]
The Creative Code Revolution
description: As art creation shifts from brushes to algorithms, a vanguard movement leveraging computation as creative material is disrupting the art world. This talk traces generative art’s evolution from fringe curiosity to ascendant artform uniquely enhanced by blockchain technology, alongside stunning artworks being released on Base from today’s leading generative artists.

speakers.name: Nat Emodi
speakers.bio: Nat Emodi is the Co-Founder and CEO of Highlight.

speakers.name: Jesse Pollak
speakers.bio: Jesse Pollak is Creator of Base. Prior to Base, Jesse led all of Coinbase’s consumer-facing engineering from early 2017 to middle 2021, including building Coinbase, Coinbase Pro, and Coinbase Wallet. Jesse joined Coinbase through the acquisition of Clef, a company he founded and ran for five years that built passwordless identity solutions for crypto companies.
